revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54GX4 |revision= |upc=745883568574 |ean= |asin=B000C77XSS |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/10/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RT3125W |manuf_rev=-D40 |availability=less common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT54GX4, SA3-AGN3023MX0100 |ic_id=3839A-WRT54GX4 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651B |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064M90TFIR4 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=EDS1216AATA-75-E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, populated,, connectorized,,
4-pin header,, JP1,, (38400,8,N,1),, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module=Airgo AGN3023MX-01 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip1_model=AGN303BB |wi1_chip2_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip2_model=AGN311RF |wi1_chip3_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip3_model=AGN312RF |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=ROME; |stock_os=Î¼Clinux;2.4.26-uc0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:13:10,00:16:B6,00:18:39 |oui_eth=00:13:10,00:16:B6,00:18:39 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with SRX400}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GX4}} "RT3125W-D40", "REV:1.1", "28-000371", and "3028-002061" :is silkscreened on the router main board. "704-00104-08" is silkscreened on the wireless module. {{see also|Askey}} WRT54GX4 serial numbers appear to start with '''KLD0'''. ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== The serial header is the (populated) '''JP1'''. 
JP1 [ (RxD) (TxD) (GND) (...) ]
  v
to RTL8651B

0x00000400 NETIF_MSG_TX_DONE
0x00000200 NETIF_MSG_INTR
0x00000100 NETIF_MSG_TX_QUEUED
0x00000080 NETIF_MSG_TX_ERR
0x00000040 NETIF_MSG_RX_ERR
0x00000020 NETIF_MSG_IFUP
0x00000010 NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN
0x00000008 NETIF_MSG_TIMER
0x00000004 NETIF_MSG_LINK
0x00000002 NETIF_MSG_PROBE
0x00000001 NETIF_MSG_DRV
==============================================
}} {{SCollapse|cat ./np |
